entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon then west 50 gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
